name: 로드 오브 히어로즈
summary:
Your time as Monarch has come.

"Conquer the World!"

In a chaotic time filled with war and ambition, there appears a shining star on the battlefield:
the Monarch of Avillon, the only one who can change fate and save the world from certain destruction.

Recruit legendary heroes and face off against powerful nations in a struggle for victory.

You stand at the center of a history in chaos.
"Are you ready to create a world of your own?"
